title: Game Progress Route
content:
and if successful, she will go through again your mind to discover your wants and hopes. This, however, has a bigger reason for why she's doing it, as she's questioning your faith. Choosing any of the checks will require you to pass a DC of 14, when successful, she shares her story of how the Absolute gave her everything she wanted which is freedom.

She gives you a mission and then you hear the voice of the dream visitor inside your head. They urge you to play along so you can get closer to the
